# Get document upload and indexing status

Intended for debugging/validation. Fetches the current upload and indexing status of documents.

Tip: Use [/debug/\{datasource\}/status](https://developers.glean.com/docs/indexing_api/indexing_api_troubleshooting/#debug-datasource-document) for richer information.
